tool_description: Quickly consume data from the SIIAU system
title: siiau-api

api_list.name: Get payment order
api_list.description: Retrieves the payment order information of the student

required_parameters.name: x-student-code
required_parameters.description: The student code used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

required_parameters.name: x-student-nip
required_parameters.description: The student nip used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

api_list.name: Get schedule
api_list.description: Retrieves the schedule of the student from some calendar if specifed. If no calendar passed, then return the last calendar schedule

required_parameters.name: x-student-code
required_parameters.description: The student code used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

required_parameters.name: x-student-nip
required_parameters.description: The student nip used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

api_list.name: Get admission
api_list.description: Retrieves the admission information of the student

required_parameters.name: x-student-code
required_parameters.description: The student code used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

required_parameters.name: x-student-nip
required_parameters.description: The student nip used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

api_list.name: Get credits information
api_list.description: Retrieves the credits information about the student

required_parameters.name: x-student-code
required_parameters.description: The student code used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

required_parameters.name: x-student-nip
required_parameters.description: The student nip used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

api_list.name: Get grades/kardex
api_list.description: Retrieves the grades per subject of the student from some calendar if specifed. Alternatively you can use the kardex endpoint, will produce the same output.

required_parameters.name: x-student-code
required_parameters.description: The student code used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

required_parameters.name: x-student-nip
required_parameters.description: The student nip used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

api_list.name: Login status
api_list.description: Check if the credentials are correct

required_parameters.name: x-student-code
required_parameters.description: The student code used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

required_parameters.name: x-student-nip
required_parameters.description: The student nip used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

api_list.name: Get student progress
api_list.description: Retrieves the progress of the student by Semester-Calendar/Career/Campus

required_parameters.name: x-student-code
required_parameters.description: The student code used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

required_parameters.name: x-student-nip
required_parameters.description: The student nip used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

api_list.name: Get student information
api_list.description: Retrieves the general information about the student

required_parameters.name: x-student-code
required_parameters.description: The student code used to authenticate to the SIIAU system

required_parameters.name: x-student-nip
required_parameters.description: The student nip used to authenticate to the SIIAU system
